    • 方法详细资料

      • defaultTicket

      • getGameInstance

        public BaseGameInstance getGameInstance()
        从类复制的说明: BaseTicket
        This is a workaround of JPA's lack of polymorphic association. As BaseGameInstance is a @MappedSuperclass, no entity association can be annotated on it. But we need a unified interface for accessing game instance from BaseTicket, that is why these 2 abstract methods defined: getGameInstance() and setGameInstance().

        Refer to

        • https://hibernate.onjira.com/browse/EJB-199?focusedCommentId=32855&page =com .atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment- 32855
        • http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6853802/jpa-table-per-class-problems -with-manytoone
        I do agree with Don Tam's solution.
        指定者:
        getGameInstance 在类中 BaseTicket

      • setGameInstance

        public void setGameInstance(BaseGameInstance gameInstance)
        指定者:
        setGameInstance 在类中 BaseTicket
